page.title: 11R.A.F. W'field - Equipment
page.content: In Head Quarters there is a British Commander who makes sure that British regulations are observed. One of the four world-wide Red Horse groups is stationed at the base. These units specialise in runway repair and they are all-round constructors who put up bridges and erect fences, they also build buildings and many other things. There is an all-British fire brigade, and a police force that is mainly British with a few Americans. There is one runway which is controlled by the only hand operated control tower left over from the 2nd World War. The tower receives the up to date weather forecast.
